QuestData.Title: Band of Blood Brothers
QuestData.Description: You are the one that Toryl was bellowing about? Perhaps you can help me.$B$BWhen I set out to search for Throndyr, I was not alone. Three vrykul loyal to Throndyr also accompanied me. As you can plainly see, I now stand alone.$B$BFind my kin, $n.$B$BI cannot bear to think that they also share Throndyr's fate.
QuestData.LogDescription: Locate Katarine, Fjolrik, and Stokalfr in Muddledeep Cavern.
QuestData.CompletionText: I must know what has befallen my kin.
QuestData.RewardText: My kin are safe. Let us see to these serpents!
